string.text:
The AK-105 is a 5.45x39mm carbine version of the AK-74M rifle. The AK-105 is supplementing AKS-74U carbines in Russian Army service. Ideal for CQC (close quarters combat), it's not intended for long range combat. The rifle's reiver is made of stamped steel; the magazine is made out of reinforced fibreglass and the stock is made of hollow plastic, making it lighter, more durable, and allowing a field kit to be stored inside of it.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: all scopes for Dovetail mount except of PSO scopes with eye cup due to the inconvenience of using these scopes on AK type of rifles and 1P59 Giperon.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS: Clear Sky modification kit, Duty modification kit, Mercenary modification kit

The Swamp Thing is a very rare customized variant of the AK-105. It is found mainly among the veterans of Clear Sky. Due to the presence of several sighting devices, it is ideal for combat both at close and medium-long distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Elcan SpecterDr, Trijicon RMR and AN/PEQ-15 LAM (integrated)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor

The Shakal is a very rare customized variant of the AK-105. It is found mainly among the veterans of Duty. Due to the presence of several sighting devices, it is ideal for combat both at close and medium-long distances.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: Trijicon Acog, Trijicon RMR and AN/PEQ-15 LAM (integrated)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor
